casebody.data:
Sullivan et al., Appellants, v. Portington, Respondent. (Superior Court of Buffalo, General Term. November 19, 1889.)

Argued before Beckwith, C. J., and Titus and Hatch, JJ.

No opinion. Judgment of municipal court modified, by making judgment herein in favor of plaintiff for the sum of $157.72, and, as so modified, affirmed, without costs.
